attachments.title: Popaganda: Navigating Workplace Patriarchy | Bitch Media
attachments.text: The author of "Feminist Fight Club" and the co-host of the About Race podcast share ideas for dealing with sexism and racism at work.
attachments.fallback: Bitch Media: Popaganda: Navigating Workplace Patriarchy | Bitch Media

text: We should get a subscription to Bitch.
i’ll bring in my back issues if caitlin will let me :sweat_smile:

im going to listen to this <@U06DFL7BP>  but curious if this is a podcast on how women need to adjust their behavior to be heard in the workplace vs how men can adjust to make space for women’s contributions in meetings?
I have some too, if I can find them
i mean i trust bitch, im just kinda exhausted by hearing how else i have to adjust myself to be heard
either way, appreciate you sharing!
I plan on wearing a fake beard and Adam’s apple to my next family gathering. Easiest way of being heard there.
<@U13GPDA1F> to be totally honest, i haven’t listened to all of it yet - it was shared by someone i trust, and would trust bitch not to take that tactic.
but so far, it’s emboldening to use feminist language and call out issues, rather than shrink into the system
and enabling yourself and those around you to recognize the behavior
manterruption, broproppriation
put titles to behaviors that have patterns, so that they can be more easily recognized
every time i interrupt someone i feel very self conscious now, i think its a good thing?
it is!
Yes
manterruption is good
i mean, interrupting people is in general not great :slightly_smiling_face:
awesome, would love for some of the men here to listen to this and report back :wink:
i will too, of course :nail_care:
that wasnt a call out of any guys here, btw. its just that its equally important for men to educate themselves on women’s issues as it is for women.  im very stoked a man shared something like this

```"if you see someone interrupting a woman in a meeting, you can interrupt them to redirect the conversation back to them" 
“if someone’s taking credit for someone else has done, redirect that credit back to the originator"
“if you’re in a hiring position, for every white man you interview for a job, you need to interview a representative number of women and people of color”
```
via jessica bennett <https://www.harpercollins.com/9780062439789/feminist-fight-club>

attachments.title: Feminist Fight Club - Jessica Bennett - Hardcover
attachments.text: Part manual, part manifesto, Feminist Fight Club is a hilarious yet incisive guide to navigating subtle sexism at work, providing real-life career advice...
attachments.fallback: HarperCollins US: Feminist Fight Club - Jessica Bennett - Hardcover
